constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 46 (Thursday, March 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GIBBS:
H.R. 1820.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18, that grants Congress the
power to make all laws necessary and proper for carrying out
the powers vested by Congress in the Constitution of the
United States or in any department or officer thereof
[Page H1357]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

title: RETROACTIVE Policy Act
